name: Just Dance 2023
overview: Welcome to a new era of dance with Just Dance 2023 Edition! For the first time ever, dance to BTS with "Dynamite" and other top chart hits! Now with new online multiplayer, personalization, 3D immersive worlds, and new songs and modes year-round, you can experience a never-ending dance party all year long! Features: • Host a Private Group and invite up to five other players and play like you’re all in the same living room! • Discover all new playlists, game modes, and songs. Thanks to a new and intuitive user interface, everything is one click away! • Get a personalized experience with custom-made sessions and songs tailored to your preferences and playing habits!
